alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 8:36PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Heavy snow will impact portions of eastern Clinton, northeastern Essex, northern Lamoille, northwestern Orleans, Grand Isle, northern Chittenden and Franklin Counties through 930 PM EST... At 835 PM EST, heavy snow was reported along a line extending from near Hyde Park, Vermont to near Willsboro, New York. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Visibility less than a half mile, and snow accumulation up to 1 inch per hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility will pose a hazard to motorists. Accumulating snow will make travel difficult. Locations impacted include... Essex Junction, Burlington International Airport, Plattsburgh, Plattsburgh International Airport, South Burlington, Burlington, Peru, Beekmantown, Schuyler Falls, Chazy, Mooers, Willsboro, Enosburg Falls, Franklin, Jay, Champlain, Cambridge, Montgomery Center, Westford and Colchester. This includes the following highways... Interstate 87 between mile markers 124 and 175. Interstate 89 between mile markers 83 and 130.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Western Clinton; Western Essex
